Title: Annihilate the American aggressors
Publisher: Zhengzhou zhenye yinshuachang (鄭州振業印刷廠)
Notes: The texts on this poster are written right to left. The organisation responsible for the poster is mentioned below the image as the "Pingyuan Province Movement Committee for the People's Opposition to the United States Invasion of Taiwan and Korea" (Pingyuan sheng renmin fandui Meiguo qinlüe Taiwan Chaoxian yundong weiyuanhui - 平原省人民反对美國侵略台湾朝鮮運動委員會).
